snippet.title: Cats Pots v1.1 (MSX1)
snippet.description:
Cats Pots is a game inspired by the mechanics of the Crackpots from Atari 2600, where the objective is to prevent mice from drilling into a fence and invading the house, earning points with each victory.


Written in MSX BASIC in 2020 and compiled with the newest MSXBAS2ROM version, this new recompiled release is faster than previous one.


Donate to this game on Itch.io and you will help us to support the MSXBAS2ROM compiler project!


https://amaurycarvalho.itch.io/catspots
